supplementary_data.GO: select tr.translation_id, x.display_label AS go_terms from translation tr join transcript t on (tr.transcript_id = t.transcript_id) join object_xref ox on (t.transcript_id = ox.ensembl_id and ox.ensembl_object_type = 'Transcript') join xref x on (ox.xref_id = x.xref_id)  where x.external_db_id = 1000
